Repository Name Unauthorized: National Center for the Study of Civil Rights and African-American Culture
Notes: Documents and memorabilia of the civil rights period, local black history of Montgomery, and the history of Alabama State University. Rotating exhibits and an oral history collection are featured by the Center.  Archives collections include the: Ollie L. Brown African American Heritage Collection, E.D. Nixon Papers, and the Collection of the Montgomery Improvement AssociatioN
Source of Repository Data: Alabama Department of Archives and History
